author: glick
msg: Modified BooterTestCase to use the System Property "localRepository" set by the Surefire plugin so
that the test classes can find the maven.repo.local.  On Windows, if the String returned by the property
contains spaces, an error message is produced and TestCase fail is invoked.

author: glick
msg: Modified pom and Java classes.
o Modified Surefire pom to remove references to slf4j classes. I had
tried to use the commons-logging replacement classes, but I realized
that I didn't want to hardwire logging into the classes, so I rolled
back to using commons-logging directly. A better solution would be to
reference the plexus logger and to build a monitor using Listeners
that would allow invoking code to hook into the logging output.
o Modified Surefire's classLoader handling so that it can use the
IsolatedClassLoader when running in-process and that Surefire and
ForkedSurfireLoader use the default ClassLoader when running forked.
ForkedSurefireLoader simply gets the classLoader that loaded it and
uses it as its classLoader. In Surefire added a new run method that
doesn't take a ClassLoader as an argument. In that method the default
classLoader is accessed and set as the classLoader.

author: glick
msg: Modified all poms in the Surefire project tree so that this "experiment"
in forking can be installed as a standalone entity in a repo.local and
so that someone who wanted to test with it would modify their target
pom to make use of these modified artifacts.

author: glick
msg: Adding forking to surefire -
subproject surefire-booter
o added a test class in surefire-booter: BooterTestCase which emulates
the surefire plugin and invokes SurefireBooter varying the forkMode
variable from {"none", "once"}
o added logic to SurefireBooter which follows different logic paths
depending on the value of forkMode.  For "none" it marshals arguments
and invokes Surefire directly. For "once" it marshals arguments and uses
plexus.utils.cli to fork a process and invokes ForkedSurefireLoader.
subproject surefire
o added ForkedSurefireBooter which is invoked when a Surefire process
is forked. ForkedSurefireLoader creates arguments for the Surefire class from
strings passed to it as String[] args.
o modified Surefire - made a series of minor modifications.
subproject surefire-common
o deleted the subproject - determined that it was not required
